channel.title: Reaper Buff ideas
channel.description:
Note: Im only asking for one of these. Both might be OP
Reaper's main problem are that he lacks ways of deflecting claims. Chilling someone can help but they can just put you in thier will and your screwed. The Possessor can just Possess when under suspension and thus set everyone else back to square one.
Here is my solution: A second night ability
Soul Shatter (1-3 uses) - Kill your target, remove his journal and defile him. Cost's 3 soul's. Reveals their real Class to the Reaper
Now a second solution to this is upping his kill power. This doesn't sound like it addresses the issue but a higher KPN means less time to find you.
Second solution:
Gather darkness (same as now) - The attack on the target can't fail (bypasses night immunity, Healing, occupation, ect) Also attacks visitors (Normal attack. Doesn't bypass night immunity/healing) Visitor kills will die immediately and you won't get thier soul's.
This is basically a combo if the ritualist and Enforcer's main ability. In addition to Upping KPN it also lets you defend yourself vs roleblockers. Right now I rarely use gather darkness except to kill the king. The mastermind is usually not found by me as Reaper before everyone else.
